title: Endogenies and Linearisation
authors: Adrien Deloro and Frank O. Wagner
abstract:
We show that the action of two infinite commuting invariant rings of
endomorphisms of a finite-dimensional virtually connected irreducible bi-module
linearizes into a vector space over a definable field. The same holds if the
action is merely by strongly commuting endogenies, modulo some finite
katakernel.
